div.head: Summary
div.p: The Google Search Appliance which is used to provide a unified search across all public-facing university web sites comes up for renewal by February 2011. If we wish to consider a move to a software-only solution, we need at least 3 months to migrate, so a decision must be made in October 2010.
The current solution does not permit for dual-site operation, and has a limit of 1 million documents, but the service is stable and seems to deliver an adequate service.
A software-only solution would be preferable, and offer more flexible and extensible services, but the cost would very likely be higher in the short-term.
It is recommended that we negotiate a new 2 year agreement with Google and review again in 2012.
